name: getFormByShareHash
description:
Get the information for the [file upload form](/docs/account/05-file-sharing/05-form-builder) assigned to a [receive folder](/docs/account/05-file-sharing/04-receive-folders) by its shareHash. The form details will return all the input field settings and the CSS for the form.

Use the `include` parameter (with the value **share**) to also get the details of the associated receive folder.

**Note**

- If you prefer to find a form by its ID, you can use the [GET /forms/{id}](#operation/getFormById) endpoint instead.

ev-api-key.description: API key required to make the API call.

ev-access-token.description: Access Token required to make the API call.

shareHash.description: Share hash to retrieve the form for.

include.description: Related record types to include in the response. Valid option is **share**

$ul: **attributes**: Attributes of the form including it's included fields and css styles
**elements**: Array of form fields defined for the form
**formDescription**: Text that appears at the top of a receive form
**submitButtonText**: Text that appears on the submit button for the form
**successMessage**: Message displayed to submitter after files are uploaded
**relationships**: Share relationship data of the form.
**responseStatus**: Http status code of the response.
